thread.title_full: Coronation Street spoilers: Police drama for Bethany Platt as sinister Nathan is arrested

author: Duncan Lindsay
title: Coronation Street spoilers: Police drama for Bethany Platt as sinister Nathan is arrested
text:
(Picture: ITV) Bethany Platt finds herself in a police station in tense Coronation Street scenes after sinister Nathan ends up arrested for assault. As Nathan, who has been grooming the vulnerable teenager as part of a grim sex ring storyline, looks to Bethany for support, she takes risky action and lies for him.
Mel comes round to tell Bethany about the arrest and urges her to give Nathan an alibi. With Nathan coming round for dinner with her mum Sarah later that day, Bethany heads to the station and convinces the officers investigating the crime that Nathan was with her.
(Picture: ITV) As Nathan is released, he is grateful to Bethany and tells her she is amazing – but this is the second time that he has been arrested this year so alarm bells are well and truly ringing for fans.
Poor Bethany is under cunning Nathan’s spell and believes his pleas that he is innocent, unaware of the serious danger that she herself is heading into.
But if Sarah gets wind of Nathan’s arrests, will she discover the risk that he poses to her daughter?
One to watch: Monday 13th March at 7:30pm on ITV. 
MORE: 25 soap spoilers: Coronation Street and Emmerdale returns, EastEnders danger, Hollyoaks discovery
